import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./Home.css"; import Carousel from "react-bootstrap/Carousel"; import ProductItem from "./Product/ProductItem.js"; import * as mobileApi from "./apis/mobile"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import LoadingContainer from "../Common/helper/loading/LoadingContainer"; export default class Home extends Component { state = { data: [], loading: true }; renderList() { var result = []; for (var i = 0; i < this.state.data.length; i++) { result.push( ); } return result; } async componentDidMount() { await mobileApi .mobile() .then((success) => { if (success.status === 200) { this.setState({ data: success.data.value.$values, loading: false }); } }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }); } render() { return (
{/* Điện thoại nổi bật */}
